text: Traditionally, HR departments in India focused on full-time employment, with elaborate processes for recruitment, onboarding, performance management, and benefits administration. However, the gig economy demands a more agile and flexible approach. Recruitment strategies must now encompass sourcing talent from online platforms like Upwork and Freelancer.in, alongside traditional job boards. Companies are increasingly using AI-powered tools to screen candidates and assess their skills, particularly important when evaluating a diverse pool of gig workers from across India, from Chennai to Kolkata.
